CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( Active_Subs__c =0, Cancelled_Subs__c = 0, x3rd_Party_Active__c =0, X3rd_Party_Cancellations__c = 0 ), "Inactive",
IF(AND(Active_Subs__c >0,Cancelled_Subs__c = 0), "Active", IF(AND(Active_Subs__c >0,Cancelled_Subs__c > 0), "Partially Churned", IF(AND(Active_Subs__c =0,Cancelled_Subs__c > 0), "Churned",
IF(AND(x3rd_Party_Active__c >0,X3rd_Party_Cancellations__c = 0), "Active", IF(AND(x3rd_Party_Active__c >0,X3rd_Party_Cancellations__c > 0), "Partially Churned", IF(AND(x3rd_Party_Active__c =0,X3rd_Party_Cancellations__c > 0), "Churned",
"Confused")))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a live calculation based on the current visible status's of the accounts subscriptions on file.
CustomField.label: Ray Churn Calc (Currently)
